title: University of Virginia Wastewater Tracker
description: We are currently monitoring and predicting covid-19 cases in the Charlottesville area

title: National Institutes of Health: All of Us COPE Analysis
description: Our research partners are in need of our help to analyze `NIH All of Us COPE` survey data. They are about to launch a new survey and want "to anticipate, based on previous survey results, places where we might expect issues or challenges when we launch the new survey"
